H0.text: Remove earthworms is what Drake can do to enrich the soil so that his plants will grow better.

H1.text: Adding more water to the soil is what Drake can do to enrich the soil so that his plants will grow better.

H2.text: Increasing the amount of pesticide he uses is what Drake can do to enrich the soil so that his plants will grow better.

H3.text: Mixing decomposed plant matter into the soil enriches the soil for Drake's garden, helping his plants grow better.

A4.text: Compost improves soil fertility in gardens, landscaping, horticulture, urban agriculture, and organic farming, reducing dependency on commercial chemical fertilizers.

A5.text: Earthworms ingest partly composted material and excrete worm castings, making nitrogen, calcium, phosphorus, and magnesium available to plants.
